Projects.Title: Explainable Question Answering System For Institute Guidelines and Regulations
Projects.Description: Developed a hybrid explainable question-answering system by integrating sparse (BM25) and dense (FAISS with MiniLM embeddings) retrieval methods, followed by cross-encoder reranking (FlashRank) to improve semantic relevance and transparency in querying BITS Pilani institutional regulations.

Projects.Title: Human-in-the-Loop Pipeline: Refining Prompt Tuning with Human Feedback Integration
Projects.Description: Developed an interactive Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) pipeline to enhance entity extraction accuracy by using human feedback for prompt tuning as few shot examples.

Projects.Title: Analyzing and Mitigating Prompt Injection Techniques in AI Language Models
Projects.Description: Researched and classified various prompt injection techniques in AI language models, thoroughly analyzing their structural patterns, intended effects, and real-world impacts; systematically identified security vulnerabilities and thoughtfully proposed mitigation strategies to enhance overall model robustness.

Projects.Title: Automating Business Vehicle Insurance Underwriting with DSPy
Projects.Description: Built a robust DSPy framework to automate insurance approval by calculating the HNO equivalent, designed a custom semantic evaluation metric for accurate risk assessment, and compared DSPyâ€™s performance with LangChain and API methods, clearly highlighting key strengths and limitations.

Projects.Title: Backend Development for Social Media Platform (Inspired by Twitter)
Projects.Description: Developed a Spring Boot-based backend for a social media platform, designing and implementing RESTful APIs for user authentication, post and comment management, and profile details, while efficiently integrating an H2 database to ensure smooth data processing and secure storage and scalability.

Projects.Title: Explainable Question Answering System For Institute Guidelines and Regulations
Projects.Description: A hybrid explainable question-answering system was developed by integrating sparse (BM25) and dense (FAISS with MiniLM embeddings) retrieval methods, followed by cross-encoder reranking (FlashRank) to improve semantic relevance and transparency in querying BITS Pilani institutional regulations.

Projects.Title: Human-in-the-Loop Pipeline: Refining Prompt Tuning with Human Feedback Integration
Projects.Description: Developed an interactive Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) pipeline to enhance entity extraction accuracy by using human feedback for prompt tuning as few shot examples.

Projects.Title: Analyzing and Mitigating Prompt Injection Techniques in AI Language Models
Projects.Description: Researched and classified different prompt injection techniques in AI language models, examining their structural variations and intended effects, while evaluating their real-world impact through practical scenarios to identify potential vulnerabilities, security risks, along with mitigation strategies.

Projects.Title: Automating Business Vehicle Insurance Underwriting with DSPy
Projects.Description: Built a DSPy framework to automate insurance approval by calculating the HNO (Hired and Non-Owned) number equivalent.

Projects.Title: Data Analysis and Visualization
Projects.Description: Analyzed large datasets using Python and SQL to uncover trends, resulting in a 15% increase in customer retention. Developed interactive dashboards using Power BI for executive reporting, reducing manual reporting time by 40%.

Projects.Title: Dashboard Development and A/B Testing
Projects.Description: Built Tableau dashboards to monitor campaign performance and sales funnel metrics. Conducted A/B testing on marketing initiatives and analyzed results to optimize strategies.
